course_description: Exploration of various fiber and media including papermaking, weaving, surface design and sculptural techniques. Expendable materials fee required.

Continuation of ART_FIBR 2300 with emphasis on utilizing acquired technical processes in loom and off weaving, paper making and surface design and a means of developing visual statements. Expendable materials fee required.

Exploration of aesthetic concepts, development of personal style and instruction in advanced fiber techniques within medium selected by student. Expendable materials fee required. May repeat to 15 hours maximum.

Advanced technical and aesthetic study in medium of choice with emphasis on development of the individual student's ideas and goals. Expendable materials fee required.  May repeat to 15 hours maximum.
Continuation of ART_FIBR 7300. Repeatable to 15 hours.
